main.docTitle: Resolution of the Legislative Council (Bond Fund) (21 July 2021)
main.text: Resolution made and passed by the Legislative Council under section 3(1) of the Loans Ordinance (Cap. 61) on 21 July 2021.

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the Government be approved to borrow from any person from time to time for the purposes of the Bond Fund established by the Resolution passed on 8 July 2009 (Cap. 2 sub. leg. S) sums not exceeding in total $300 billion or equivalent, being the maximum amount of all sums borrowed under this paragraph that may be outstanding by way of principal at any time;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: sums borrowed under paragraph (a) are to be credited to the Bond Fund; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: this Resolution is to replace the Resolution passed on 22 May 2013 (Cap. 61 sub. leg. E).
